PARTNERSHIPS

Made From Eco-friendly Materials.

At BIOT, every material used in the making of
the robot in 100% recyclable.

Longer-Lasting-Batteries

The batteries in our robots are a mix
of sodium-ion and lithium-ion batteries,
thus providing benefits from both sides.

A robot is a machine-especially one
programmable by a computerâ€”capable of
carrying out a complex series of
actions automatically.

The exaple heading

The branch of technology that deals
with the design, construction, operation,
and application of robots, as well as
computer systems for their control,
sensory feedback, and information processing
is robotics.
